conclusion: Understand the setup with coil and resistors in a changing magnetic field.
Magnetic induction B changes linearly with time from 0.2 T at t=0 to 0.4 T at t=4s.
Rate of change of magnetic induction is 0.05 T/s.
Induced EMF calculated as 10 V using Faraday's law.
Total resistance in the circuit is 60 Î©.
Current in the circuit is 1/6 A using Ohm's law.
Power consumed by R is 25/18 W.
